definition: an area of lightness in a picture, apply a highlighter to one's cheeks or eyebrows in order to make them more prominent
details:
noun
- an area of lightness in a picture
= synonyms: highlighting
- the most interesting or memorable part
= example: the most interesting or memorable part
= synonyms: high spot
verb
- apply a highlighter to one's cheeks or eyebrows in order to make them more prominent
= example: apply a highlighter to one's cheeks or eyebrows in order to make them more prominent
- move into the foreground to make more visible or prominent
= example: move into the foreground to make more visible or prominent
= synonyms: foreground
